categories: Category:Imperial Navy pilots of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: A pilot served in the Imperial Navy. In 2 BBY, shortly before the Rebel Alliance's establishment, the pilot accompanied Vult Skerris in pursuit of Mon Mothma, a traitor who had spoken out against the Galactic Empire. During the chase in the Archeon Nebula, he was killed when his TIE interceptor was disintegrated by the heat of a protostar forming there.
